oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Police assualting a demonstrator
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Misenti, Tom
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photographer's description: A protester is surrounded, beaten, and dragged away by plainclothes police. 8. Underneath the bridge behind the Egyptian Museum on the edge of Tahrir Square.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Demonstrations; Egypt; Police brutality; Protest movements; Revolutions
Arms & armament; Police
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: University on the Square: Documenting Egypt's 21st Century Revolution
